summary: The diff shows a comprehensive implementation of an Apple-inspired e-commerce website with most requirements fulfilled. The implementation includes all major pages (Landing, Product Listing, Product Detail, Cart, Checkout, Login, Register, Account Dashboard) with clean, minimal design using React/TypeScript. However, some specific requirements cannot be fully verified due to diff truncation, and a few implementation details may not perfectly align with the specifications.

missing_requirements.reason: No 'WhyChooseUs' component found in the diff. The required icons (icon-shipping.dim_128x128.png, icon-quality.dim_128x128.png, icon-support.dim_128x128.png) are not referenced anywhere.

hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states 'Frontend only - no backend logic' and lists 'Backend functionality or data persistence' as a non-goal, yet a backend/main.mo file was created.

hallucinated_features.description: Context providers (CartContext, AuthContext) implementing state management
hallucinated_features.reason: While not explicitly forbidden, the requirement emphasizes 'Frontend only - no backend logic' and 'No user authentication logic'. The AuthProvider and authentication state management may exceed frontend-only scope, though it could be interpreted as UI-only auth state.
